Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Ate unham vicom ajihe vi hana jinham ne nukasana karana ate avagi'a karana ate imana vali'am vica phuta pa'una la'i ika masita bana'i. Ate isa la'i vi tam ki usa nu ghata la'una di tham de rupa vica isatemala kara sakana. Usa bade la'i jihara pahilam tom hi alaha ate usade rasula nala lara riha hai. Iha loka sahu khanage ki asim' tam sirafa neki cahi si para alaha gavaha hai iha jhuthe hana

Tusim isa imarata vica kade vi kharhe na hona. Ham, jisa masajida di ninha pahile hi dina tom takave bhava raba la'i rakhi ga'i hai. Uha isa yoga hai ki tusim isa vica khare hovo?Isa vica ajihe loka hana jo pavitara rahita (rahini) nu pasada karade hana ate alaha pavitara rahina vali'am nu pasada karada hai

Ki uha bada vadhi'a hai jisa ne apani imarata di ninha alaha de bhai'a ate alaha di prasanata upara rakhi. Jam uha bada sresata hai jisa ne apani imarata di ninha ika khada de modhe te rakhi, jihari digana vali hai. Phira uha imarata usa nu lai ke naraka di aga vica diga pa'i. Ate alaha zalimam nu raha nahim dikha'unda
Ate iha imarata jihari inham ne bana'i, uha hamesam unham de dilam vica saka da adhara bani rahegi, isa la'i ki unham de dila tukare-tukare ho jana. Alaha gi'ana vala te bibeka vala hai

Besaka alaha ne mominam tom unham de prana ate unham di ja'idada nu janata de badale kharida li'a hai. Uha alaha de raha vica yudha karade hana. Phira marade hana ate mare jande hana. Iha alaha ute taureta, ijila ate kura'ana vica ika saca va'ada hai. Alaha tom vadha ke apane va'ade nu pura karana vala kauna hai. Isa la'i tusim isa va'ade vica khusi'am mana'u jo tusim alaha nala kita hai. Ate iha hi sabha tom vadi safalata hai
